meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>conspire</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to conspire</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to plot</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: A group of <reading>hacker</reading>s (はか) are getting together and trying to conspire and plot to take down the mainframe! Those hackers!
